metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1308 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: This vulnerability in Apache Solr 1.2 to 6.6.2 and 7.0.0 to 7.2.1 relates to an XML external entity expansion (XXE) in the `&dataConfig=<inlinexml>` parameter of Solr's DataImportHandler. It can be used as XXE using file/ftp/http protocols in order to read arbitrary local files from the Solr server or the internal network. It was discovered that Apache Solr has a XML external entity expansion (XXE) vulnerability. A attacker could use it to read arbitrary local files.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
